revised_title: Tidal Oscillations in an Elliptic Basin of Variable Depth
tldr: This article examines the oscillations in an elliptic basin with a paraboloidal depth law, showing that the problem can be solved using polynomials and finding the free periods of any type of motion. The analysis provides a physical interpretation of certain theorems concerning the nature of solutions of differential equations and has applications in the theory of seiches in lakes.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Fluid Dynamics
